timeline.author: tillrohrmann

timeline.message:
[FLINK-20439][runtime] Rework scheduleOrUpdateConsumers in ExecutionGraph and its sub-components

notifyPartitionDataAvailable() is introduced to replace scheduleOrUpdateConsumers() in the RPC code path.
Execution#scheduleOrUpdateConsumers is renamed to #updatePartitionConsumers to be aligned with what id does.
